title: Anneliese Dodds – 2021 Comments on Greensill
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 6 April 2021.
content:
The Treasury knew the rules that protect public money used to back bank-run lending schemes didn’t apply to Greensill.
